verses.name: Mark 15:21
verses.text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian, who passed by, coming out of the country, the father of Alexander and Rufus, to bear his cross.

verses.name: Mark 15:22
verses.text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha, which is, being interpreted, The place of a skull.

verses.name: Mark 15:23
verses.text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh: but he received it not.

verses.name: Mark 15:24
verses.text: And when they had crucified him, they parted his garments, casting lots upon them, what every man should take.

verses.name: Mark 15:25
verses.text: And it was the third hour, and they crucified him.

verses.name: Mark 15:26
verses.text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over, THE KING OF THE JEWS.
